instruction: Explain the main factor that contributed to the improved performance of the MSCI ACWI ESG index in 2021.
output: The main factor that contributed to the improved performance of the MSCI ACWI ESG index in 2021 was stock selection. As seen in the chart below, companies that were able to adapt to the new trends resulting from the changes brought about by the COVID-19 pandemic, such as changes in consumer demand, supply chains, and worker productivity, achieved strong performance in 2021.
